author: Rick Spilman
content: The desk was made for the Vice President. Mike Pence was Vice President when it was commissioned, so you are correct. Pence was a part of an administration “hellbent on destroying the Constitution.”

author: Julius A Furer
content: Great! Made from the Constitution for someone hellbent on destroying the Constitution.

author: Jean-Pierre Declemy
content: Lovely desk with the bonus of being made from recycled timber by woodworkers maintaining traditional skills.
